channel.title: More like server Hacking. but still lol
channel.description: [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/34g36kz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/24mgkxz.jpg[/img] I Made me a client that lets me do nearly anything i want (: Not releasing source and it works on 99% of servers.* I looked around the forums for a good place to post this, it is a client hack really, so it fits here. This section (specified by the sub-title on forum homepage) says this board isnt just for tutorials, and the other section for general-programming is for non private-server related material. So here i am! lol. With this there was only one server who was smart enough to figure out how to patch this, and im sure its a spot-fix because of how the server was set up :) My client has nearly unlimited capabilities. Just thought people should be aware that I exist. lol and because people are always curious how i do these things. I only made my name matzie for proof, usually use an alias but will not give them out. *-Personal accounts, based on survey of 317-based servers, Quantity:100 Number of servers patched: 1.

item.title: More like server Hacking. but still lol
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

HcoJustin:

It’s not hard. We’ve established most servers out there don’t check the validity of incoming packets, so all we have to do is spoof them and we have free reign.

This.
Also, if you aren’t going to release the source code for this client, there is nothing for us to critique or discuss.
I’ve also noticed that you are exploiting on an Allstar server. Unless that server has worked out the absolute majority of all exploits and added necessary code for checking packets, messing with one is not all too difficult of a task.
And what is ‘unlimited capabilities’ supposed to imply? Give us a list of your supposed features, and proof in the form of videos, pictures, etc.

Read full topic
